frontmatter.title: Decentralized identity
frontmatter.description: What is decentralized identity, and why does it matter?
frontmatter.summaryPoint1: Traditional identity systems have centralized the issuance, maintenance and control of your identifiers.
frontmatter.summaryPoint2: Decentralized identity removes reliance on centralized third parties.
frontmatter.summaryPoint3: Thanks to crypto, users now have the tools to issue, hold and control their own identifiers and attestations once again.
